Orquídea sells chicken and bean tamales.  She’s married and lives with her husband; she does not have children.  She started the business a year ago with her husband but her mother-in-law was who taught her.  She works every day of the week from 7am until 5pm.

She is asking for a loan at present to buy corn, firewood, beans, oil and other products needed to make tamales.  This purchase will help her to have all the supplies necessary to continue with her business and obtain the best prices for the products she buys.  She wants to grow by means of the loans and to help her family meet household expenses.

loans.use: to by corn, firewood, beans and oil.

loans.name: Ayuen

texts.en:
Ayuen is a 29 year old a married woman who has three children, all of whom are in school. She has had a business of selling groceries in a store in bor, south Sudan for three years.

Ayuen has requested this loan through BRAC, south Sudan to purchase chalk of sugar and onions. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase chalk of sugar and onion to sell.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: El señor Víctor trabaja como carpintero. El crédito que solicita es para compra de material (madera, venesta, cola, etc.) ya que se le presento un trabajo muy importante y necesita reemplazar la madera. Víctor es divorciado y tiene dos hijos .Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona  de San Pedro de la Ciudad de La Paz. Esta es la quinta vez que solicita que su crédito sea financiado a través de Kiva. Es cliente antiguo desde el año 2009.
texts.en: Víctor works as a carpenter.  The loan he’s requesting is to buy materials (lumber, fiber board, glue, etc.) because he’s gotten a very important job and needs to replace the wood.  Víctor is divorced and has two children.  He lives in his own house located in the city of La Paz’s San Pedro zone.  This is the fifth time he’s asked that his loan be financed through Kiva.  He’s been a longstanding client since 2009.

loans.use: to buy lumber, fiber board and glue.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
Teresa, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, su negocio lo inició con la intención de tener una fuente de ingreso para apoyar a su esposo, en los gastos del hogar, en la actualidad tiene clientes que son vecinos y amigos cercanos.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz y leña, serían 10 quintales de maíz para poder disponer para tiempo futuro, esta inversión ayudará para mejorar su producción y mantenerse en el negocio.
Su aspiración es convertirse en un futuro con un negocio más grande, con empleados y poder proveer a su familia todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Teresa sells tortillas. She lives with her husband and three children. She started her business with the goal of having a source of income for helping her husband with the household expenses. Currently, her customers are neighbors and friends living nearby. 

She is applying for the loan in order to buy corn and firewood. There will be 1000 lb of corn, in order to have it available for the future. This investment will help her improve her production, and keep her business going. 

Her ambition is to someday turn her activity into a larger business, with employees, and to be able to provide her family with all the necessities.

loans.use: To buy 1000 lb of corn, as well as firewood.

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es: La señora Emiliana trabaja como secretaria en un Instituto Médico de la ciudad de La Paz; además de esta actividad, se dedica a la elaboración de calzados para damas, para cubrir el saldo de sus necesidades mensuales. El crédito lo requiere para aumentar su capital y comprar material, como cuero, hebillas, gomas para tacos, etc. Emiliana es casada y tiene dos hijos. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona  de Villa Nueva Potosí de la Ciudad de La Paz. Emiliana se encuentra muy satisfecha con los  créditos anteriormente  otorgados y esta es la tercera vez que su solicitud será enviada  a kiva.
texts.en:
Emiliana works as a secretary at a medical institution in the city of La Paz.  In addition to that job she makes women’s shoes in order to cover the balance of her monthly necessities.

She needs the loan to increase her capital and to buy material like leather, buckles, and rubber for heels, etc.

Emiliana is married and has two children.  She lives in her parents’ house in the Villa Nueva Potosí zone in the city of La Paz.

Emilia is very pleased with the previous loans she was granted.  This is the third time that her request will be sent to Kiva.

loans.use: to buy material like leather, buckles, and rubber for heels, etc. to continue in her business of making women's shoes.

loans.name: Moila

texts.en:
Moila is from the village Beitarabchi, East Georgia. He is 64 years old, married and lives with his family: his wife, Ava, a 29 year old son and a daughter in law. All family members are involved in the family farming activities. The farm is the only source of income for the family. In particular, they have 6 milk cows and 20 sheep. Ava produces cheese and sells it locally. Also, the family sells lambs in the village. Along with domestic animals the family has a 3 hectare plot of the land, where maize and sunflowers are grown. Harvested corns are sold locally as well. Total average monthly income of the family is 900 Laris. 

Moila has requested credit for hiring a tractor, which will till the land. After properly done seasonal work, Moila can count on a good harvest next year. They will sell the harvest for a convenient price and gets the planned income, which will be used for the family's daily needs.

loans.use: to cover the cost of tilling the plot of the land.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel, vive con su familia, su esposa y una hija, el trabaja atendiendo una granja de cerdos, el cual aprendió por medio de sus padres, ya que ellos son comerciantes de cerdos, no tiene un horario fijo porque la granja está instalada en la vivienda.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de cerdos y  concentrado, ya que quiere crecer en su negocio y mantener cerdos  con un buen peso, ya que esto le permite mejorar las ventas. 
La aspiración de Manuel es mejorar en su negocio, administrar bien el préstamo y estar al pendiente de las necesidades su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel lives with his wife and daughter and manages a pig farm, a trade he was taught by his parents who also raise pigs for a living.  On the farm, there is no set schedule of work.
He seeks this credit to buy pigs and feed stock for them, so they can grow large for sale at a good price in the market. 
Manuel aspires to grow his business, manage his funds well and take good care of his family.

loans.use: to buy pigs and feed

loans.name: Bruno

texts.es: Bruno se dedica a la venta de CDs grabados con películas, canciones y otros. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de una máquina selladora para mejorar la calidad de los videos que vende, y también para la compra de CDS en blanco. Bruno es soltero y sin hijos. Vive en la Zona de San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz. Esta es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo de IMPRO y de Kiva.
texts.en:
Bruno sells recorded CDs containing movies, songs, and other media. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy a sealing machine so that he can improve the quality of the videos that he sells. He also wants to buy blank CDs. Bruno is single and has no children. He lives in the District of San Pedro in the city of La Paz.

This is the first he has requested a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a sealing machine and blank compact discs.

loans.name: Cristobal De Jesus

texts.es:
Cristóbal, es agricultor vive con su esposa y sus hijos, su trabajo inicio desde joven, siembra en lo propio, no tiene por un horario fijo.
Actualmente comprara insumos agrícolas como abono y herbicidas para aplicarlos al cultivo, por esto solicita un préstamo que le cubra dicho gasto y poder fortalecer la plantación.
Su aspiración es que sus cultivos mejoren y que la cosecha sea abundante.
texts.en:
Cristóbal is a farmer who lives with his wife and children. His job began when he was young, planting on his own; He does not have a set schedule.

Now he will buy agricultural inputs like fertilizer and herbicides to put on the crops. This is why he is asking for a loan, to cover said cost and to be able to strengthen the plantation. 

His goal is that his crops will get better and that the harvest will be plentiful.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides.

loans.name: Exequiel

texts.es: Exequiel se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en la ciudad de Oruro. El crédito que solicita es para aumento de  capital y comprar mercadería como arroz, azucar, fideo, dulces, pan, etc. Exequiel es soltero y no tiene hijos. Vive en casa de sus tíos en la ciudad de Oruro, pero viene cada 15 días a La Paz de visita a la casa de  sus padres ubicada en la zona  de Pasankeri de la Ciudad de La Paz. Ezequiel es cliente antiguo y esta es la primera vez que solicita que su crédito sea canalizado a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Exequiel sells groceries in the city of Oruro. The loan he is requesting will be used to increase his capital so that he can buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, noodles, candy, bread, and other products. Exequiel is single and has no children. He lives at the house of his aunt and uncle in the city of Oruro, but every 15 days he visits his parents at their home in the District of Pasankeri in the city of La Paz.

Exequiel is a long-time client, but this is the first time his loan request is being referred to Kiva.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, noodles, candy, bread, and other products.

loans.name: Germin Antonio

texts.es:
Germin, es empleado de un hospital, vive con su esposa, no tienen hijos, solamente viven los dos, él trabaja como empleado del hospital, lleva 18 años trabajando en el lugar.
Actualmente Germin solicita un préstamo para el pago de unas recetas de su esposa, pues no cuenta con la solvencia económica para la compra de medicamentos familiares.
Su aspiración es suplir las necesidades de su familia, trabajando de la mejor manera para conservar el empleo.
texts.en:
Germin is employed in a hospital. He lives with his wife and they do not have children; so it is just the two of them.  

He works in a hospital, and has been employed there for 18 years. Now, Germin is applying for a loan to pay for some prescriptions for his wife, as he doesn't have the financial means to buy medicines for his family. 

His ambition is to meet his family's needs, working as best he can, so that he can keep his job.

loans.use: To pay for some prescriptions for his wife.

loans.name: Livia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  ”VIRGEN PURIFICADA DE TUPAC AMARU;  El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urcos en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Livia;  La socia tiene 38 años de edad, La socia es conviviente, La socia tiene 4 hijos de 18, 8, 4, 1 años de edad;

La socia trabaja comprando y vendiendo animales menores, como cuyes, gallinas, pollos; La socia también vende carne de forma independiente en uno de los extemos del mercado, la socia no tiene un stand determinado, pero le encantaría tenerlo en un futuro cercano, ella mayormente habla quechua y muy poco de castellano, la socia prepara cuando le hacen pedidos cuy asado, es un plato muy rico y a base de cuy al horno acompañado de papas, ensalada y un ají picantito. este es un potaje exótico; La socia es una mujer muy trabajdora motivo por el cual realiza muchas actividades, pero a ella le gusta estar ocupada y desea dar calidad de vida a sus pequeños hijos y seguir trabajndo en todo lo que se pueda para sacar adelante a los hijos. La socia requiere el crédito para invertir en la compra de carne, otra parte en la compra de 10 cuyes.
 
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Livia belongs to the "Virgen Purificada de Tupac Amaru" communal bank, located in Urcos district, in the province of Quispicanchis, in the department of Cusco. She is 38. She lives with her partner, and has four children, ages 18, 8, 4, and 1.  

She buys and sells small animals, such as guinea pigs, hens and roosters. She also has a small independently-run butcher shop at one end of the market. She doesn't have her own stand, but she would love to have one in the near future. She speaks very little Spanish, mostly Quechua. She also fills orders for roast guinea pig. The client prepares orders for roasted guinea pig, which is a very rich dish served with potatoes, salad and a spicy garlic sauce--an exotic chowder. 

The client is a hard working and motivated woman who has a number of businesses and activities, but she likes to be busy. She wants to offer her small children a higher quality of life, and continue working as much as she can so that her children can get ahead. She wants a loan to purchase meat, and also to buy 10 guinea pigs 

The client is grateful for the loan and promises to make make payments in accordance with her loan schedule.

loans.use: to buy meat, including 10 guinea pigs.

loans.name: Yisenia Andrea

texts.es: La señora Yisenia a sus 28 años de edad es madre de dos hijos de 9 y 7 años. La señora Yisenia es una emprendedora quien inició su propio negocio que le permitirá dedicarle a sus dos hijas mas tiempo y cuidados, puesto que no tenia quien se las cuidara para ir a trabajar. La señora Yisenia inicio una pequeña sala de belleza en su casa con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos y los de su familia. La señora Yisenia empieza su jornada de trabajo muy temprano con el fin de organizar a sus hijos para la escuela y posteriormente iniciar sus labores en el salón de belleza que alterna con las labores de ama de casa. La señora Yisenia requiere comprar una plancha para el cabello y una silla para la peluquería, con esto, tendrá la posibilidad de mejorar su trabajo y el servicio que presta y así poder aumentar sus clientes e ingresos. Con lo anterior la señora Yisenia podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y cumplir su sueño de tener mucho más grande su salón de belleza.
texts.en:
Señora Yisenia is 28 years old. She is a mother of two children, aged 7 and 9. Yisenia is a hard worker who started her own business. This allows her to dedicate more time to the care of her daughters, because she did not have anyone to care for them while she went to work. 

Señora Yisenia started a small beauty salon in her home with the goal of improving her family’s and her income. She starts her workday very early in order to get her children ready for school. Later she starts her work in the beauty salon, and alternates between this and doing work around the house. 

She needs to purchase a flat iron and a salon chair. With these things, she will have the possibility to improve her work and the service she provides, which will help her expand her clientele and increase her income.  By so doing, Señora Yisenia will be able to improve her family’s quality of life and fulfill her dream of significantly expanding her beauty salon.

loans.use: to purchase equipment like a flat iron and a salon chair.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: La Sra. Martha se dedica a la venta de ropa en una de las calles mas concurridas de la ciudad de Cochabamba, sale a su puesto muy temprano ya que el flujo de clientes es mayor durante las mañanas en especial los días de feria (miércoles y sábado),  tiene esposo el no vive con ella, cabe recalcar que es rentista y no tiene hijos por los que velar directamente,  el motivo principal es tener mayor mercadería para estas fiestas de fin de año, por este motivo solicito el crédito para la compra de ropa de temporada, es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad que le brinda.
texts.en:
Martha sells clothing on one of the busiest streets in the city of Cochabamba. She goes out to her stand very early, as the flow of customers is greater during the mornings, especially on market days (Wednesday and Saturday). 

She has a husband who does not live with her. It is worth emphasizing that she is a retiree, and doesn't have children to care for directly. 

The main reason for the loan is to have more merchandise for the year-end holidays. For this reason, she applied for the loan, in order to buy seasonal clothing. She is a very hard-working person, and feels happy about the opportunity she has been provided.

loans.use: To buy seasonal clothing as merchandise for sale.

loans.name: Evarista

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  ”VIRGEN PURIFICADA DE TUPAC AMARU;  El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urcos en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Evarista;  La socia tiene 37 años de edad, La socia es conviviente, La socia tiene 4 hijos de 17, 12, 10, 1 año; La socia trabaja comprando y vendiendo animales menores como cuyes, gallinas y vendiendo frutas, todo tipo de fruta; La socia tiene un pequeño stand informal a un extremo de la plaza principal del poblado en el cual se ubica todos los días y vende la fruta que previamente compra al por mayor en la ciudad de Cusco de un muy conocido mercado de venta de abastos y ella trae en cajas y los vende al por menor en este su espacio. La socia desea poder invertir el préstamo en la compra de frutas y aumentar su mercadería, también pagara el transporte desde Cusco hasta Urcos que está ubicado a 1 hora y 10 minutos. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de frutas y transporte.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Evarista belongs to the "Virgen Purificada de Tupac Amaru" communal bank, located in the district of Urcos, in Quispicanchis province, in the department of Cusco. She is 37 years old. She lives with her partner, and has four children, ages 17, 12, 10, and 1. 

She works buying and selling small animals, such as guinea pigs, chickens, and also fruit; all kinds of fruit. 

She has a small informal stand, at one end of the main town plaza, where she is found every day. She sells fruit that she buys at wholesale in the city of Cusco, from a very well-known produce market. She brings it home in boxes, and sells it at retail from her stand.  

She wants to use the loan to buy fruit, and increase her supply of merchandise. She will also pay for transportation from Cusco to Urcos, which is located one hour and ten minutes away. 

Evarista is applying for the loan to buy fruit, and pay for transportation. She is grateful for the loan, and is committed to making her scheduled instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy fruit, and pay for transportation.

loans.name: Magdalena Del Carmen

texts.es:
Magdalena, se dedica a la venta de pollos de engorde, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, ella inicio la granja por cuenta propia, y tiene 8 meses  de estar en el negocio, les vende a los vecinos y amigos cercanos.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de más pollos pequeños y comprar concentrado y vacunas, toda esta inversión para aumentar en la temporada navideña, ya que en ese mes los clientes aumentan sus pedidos de pollo.
La aspiración de Magdalena es seguir con su pequeña granja, aumentándola cada día, para generar ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Magdalena sells broiler chickens. She lives with her husband and three children. She started the farm as a self-employment venture, and has been in business for eight months. She sells to neighbors and friends who live nearby. 

She is applying for the loan, in order to buy more small chickens, and to buy concentrate and vaccinations. All of this investment is to increase production for the Christmas season, as in that month, customers increase their chicken orders.

Magdalena's ambition is to continue with her small chicken farm, expanding it every day, so that she can generate income for her family.

loans.use: To buy small chickens, concentrate, and vaccinations.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es: La señora María Dolores a sus 46 años de edad es madre de un hijo de 11 años, se ha dedicado la mayor parte de su vida a la actividad de engorde de pollos y cerdos, esta actividad la aprendió de su madre y es la que le permite generar los ingresos para su hogar. La señora María Dolores requiere de la compra de pollos y cuido que le permita suplir la demanda de fin de año y a su vez aumentar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. El sueño de la señora María Dolores es construir la vivienda para sus pollos mucho más grande y darle una buena educación a su hijo.
texts.en:
Maria Dolores is 46 years old and mother of an 11-year-old son. She has spent most of her life fattening up pigs and chickens, which she learned from her mother and which allows her to earn income for her household. Maria Dolores needs to buy chickens and feed in order to fill the end-of year demand while at the same time increasing her income and improving her family's quality of life. 

Maria Dolores's dream is to build a much larger coop for her chickens and to provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: Buy chickens and feed

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: La Sra. Juana tiene como actividad la venta de quinua y chuño; estos productos son adquiridos por quintal en Oruro posteriormente los traslada a Cochabamba y ocasionalmente a santa cruz donde los comercializa en los diferentes mercados , tiene experiencia de 7 años en esta actividad; su esposo es jubilado rentista de la sus hijos son todos independientes la casa donde vive es propia la cual esta ubicada al sud de la ciudad una zona periurbana; el crédito que se le otorgara es para la compra de material de construcción y techado de una habitación en su domicilio que posteriormente será para que pueda abrir una tienda de barrio, la cliente es una persona responsable agradece la confianza que se le brindo en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en:
Juana has a business selling quinoa and potato flour. She gets these products 100 pounds at a time in Oruro, then moves them to Cochabamba and sometimes to San Cruz, where they are sold in the different markets. She has been doing this for seven years. 

Her husband is a retired investor. Her children are all independent. The house where she lives is her own, and it is located south of the city in a suburban area.  

The loan she has been granted is for the purchase of construction material and roofing for a room in her home which she will later use to open a neighborhood store. This client is a responsible person who appreciates the trust that the loan organization has shown her.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and roofing for a room.

loans.name: Ivania Azucena

texts.es: Ivania Azucena tiene una  actividad económica que  es la venta de mercadería en general, toda la vida a luchado para salir adelante junto con su esposo formaron un pequeño  negocio en el cual le ha  generado ingresos para sostener a la familia. Ivania  tiene dos nietos en el cual todavía están a su cargo y a sacado adelante, el préstamo que está solicitando  es para la compra de ropa, zapatos, cosméticos, aretes  entre otros productos, con este préstamo estará invirtiendo más en mercadería y podrá satisfacer a su clientes con los productos que tendrá.
texts.en:
Ivania Azucena sells general merchandise. All her life she has struggled to get ahead in life. With her husband she started a small business, through  which she has generated income to support her family. Ivania has two grandchildren who are still in her care, and she has raised them. 

The loan she is applying for is to buy clothing, shoes, cosmetics, earrings, and other products. With this loan she will be investing in more merchandise, and will be able to satisfy her customers with the products she has.

loans.use: To buy clothing, shoes, cosmetics, earrings and other products.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  ”VIRGEN PURIFICADA DE TUPAC AMARU;  El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urcos en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Mercedes;  La socia tiene 44 años de edad, La socia es conviviente, La socia tiene 2 hijos de 24, 20, años de edad; La socia trabaja prestando el servicio de alquiler de maquinas pesadas, la socia tiene un negocio familiar, ella tiene maquinaria pesada y también fabricación de bloquetas, la socia vende bloquetas al por mayor a las diferentes constructoras o personas independientes y les alquila un camión o una maquinaria para trasladar el material comprado y también  se dedica  a la compra y venta de graba, arena, piedra chancada. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en el combustible para las maquinarias pesadas y comprar piedra.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Mercedes belongs to the "Virgen Purificada de Tupac Amaru" communal bank, located in the district of Urcos in Quipicanchis province, in Cusco department. She is 44 years old. She lives with her partner, and has two children, ages 24 and 20. 

She rents heavy equipment.  It is a family business. She has heavy equipment, and also makes cement blocks. She sells blocks at wholesale to various construction companies or individuals, and rents them a truck or equipment to move material they have bought. She also buys and sells gravel, sand, and crushed rock. 

She is applying for the loan to buy fuel for the heavy equipment, and rock. She is grateful for the loan, and promises to make payments in accordance with her loan schedule.

loans.use: To buy fuel for heavy equipment, as well as rock.

loans.name: Mayra Magaly

texts.es:
Mayra, se dedica a vender pupusas, vive con sus padres, es soltera, este negocio lo aprendió por una tía, actualmente trabaja en su casa, cuenta con clientes y sus padres le apoyan en todo momento.
Ella necesita comprar materiales para elaborar las pupusas, por eso solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, aceite, quesillo, chicharrón, para tener disponibles estos productos y atender la demanda de los clientes.
Su aspiración es algún día formar su propia familia, tener siempre el negocio para tener ya una fuente de ingreso para su familia.
texts.en:
Mayra sells pupusas (stuffed corn tortillas). She is single and lives with her parents. She was the taught this business by an aunt. Currently she works out of her home. She has customers, and her parents support her at all times. 

She needs to buy materials for making pupusas. That's why she is applying for a loan to buy corn, cooking oil, quesillo (soft cheese), and roast pork, in order to have these products available and meet the demand from her customers. 

Her ambition is to someday start her own family, and to always have the business, so that she already has a source of income for her family.

loans.use: To buy corn, cooking oil, quesillo (soft cheese), and roast pork.

loans.name: Amalia Sarai

texts.es:
Amalia, vive con sus padres, es soltera, se dedica a vender pupusas, este negocio comenzó por el apoyo de su madre, trabaja en su casa, sus clientes son vecinos del lugar, y hasta la fecha no ha tenido inconvenientes con el negocio.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales para hacer las pupusas, como el quesillo, chicharrón, aceite, maíz, condimentos y gaseosas, esto le ayudara para mantenerse en el negocio y poder atender a la clientela con su servicio de pupusas.
Amalia aspira tener en un futuro su propio hogar, con un negocio más grande y apoyar siempre a sus padres, por todo lo que han hecho por ella.
texts.en:
Amalia lives with her parents. She is single and sells pupusas (stuffed tortillas or tortilla rellenas). She began this business with the help of her mother. She works at home and her customers are her neighbors. As of now she has had no problems concerning the business.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy supplies to make the pupusas, such as cheese, pork rinds, oil, corn, condiments and soft drinks. This will help her remain in business and help her tend to her clients serving them pupusas.

Amalia hopes to have her own home in the future, with a larger business and always support her parents because of all that they have done for her.

loans.use: purchase of cheese, pork rinds, oil, corn, condiments and soft drinks

loans.name: Manuel Elenilson

texts.es:
Manuel, vive con su familia, con su esposa y una hija, él es carpintero, desde hace trece años administra el taller, este oficio lo aprendió desde joven y ha logrado mantener a su familia a través de los trabajos que le llevan los clientes.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de madera de cedro, aceituno, laurel, pega y pinturas, para mantener en el taller todo los materiales necesarios, así podrá mejorar su capacidad de respuesta y la calidad en su trabajo.
Manuel aspira tener un mejor movimiento en el taller, que sean más los clientes que le visiten, para que sus ingresos aumenten.
texts.en:
Manuel lives with his family, which consists of his wife and daughter. He is a carpenter. He has been running a workshop for three years. He learned this trade from a young age, and has managed to support his family through the work that his customers bring to him. 

He is applying for a loan to buy wood such as cedar, aceituno (paradise tree) and laurel, as well as glue and paint. This is in order to have all the necessary materials in the workshop. This will enable him to improve both his ability to respond to orders, and the quality of his work. 

Manuel's ambition is to have more activity in the workshop, and to have more customers visit, so that his income increases.

loans.use: To buy wood such as cedar, aceituno (paradise tree), laurel, as well as glue and paint.

loans.name: Komla

texts.fr:
Komla est un homme âgé  de 26 ans. Il est mariée à une revendeuse et n’a pas d’enfants.
Komla travaille comme revendeur des produits de premières nécessités depuis 2005. Il a une boutique dans laquelle il satisfait ses clients.
Komla a requis son troisième  crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits de premières nécessités Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Komla voudrait agrandir  le commerce. Il dit qu’avec les profits, Il prévoit avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en: Komla is a 26-year-old man.  He is married to a reseller and does not have any children.  Komla has been reselling basic grocery products since 2005.  He has a shop and meets his customers' satisfaction.  Komla has requested a third loan from WAGES in order to buy basic grocery items. He would like to reinvest in his business.  In the coming years, Komla would like to increase the size of his shop.  He says that with the profits he is planning to have a happy family.

loans.use: To buy grocery products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay to install electricity in his home

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es:
Ana, vive con su hija y dos nietos, ella administra una tienda donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad desde hace 10 años, su hija le ayuda a atender a los clientes, viven en una zona donde hay bastante clientela.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos para la tienda como: aceite, arroz, frijoles, harina para hacer tortillas, condimentos y boquitas, la compra le ayudara para incrementar el negocio y atender a la demanda de los clientes.
Entre sus aspiraciones es tener una mejor calidad de vida con su hija y nietos, creciendo en el negocio y siendo una buena cliente.
texts.en:
Ana lives together with her daughter and two grandchildren.  She runs a store where she has been selling basic household products for ten years.  Her daughter helps her to serve her customers.  They live in an area where there are a lot of customers. 

Ana is requesting a loan to buy products for her store such as oil, rice, beans, flour for making tortillas, seasonings and snacks.  This purchase will help her to increase her business and meet her customer demand.

Ana's aspirations include achieving a better quality of life for her daughter and grandchildren, growing in her business and being a good client.

loans.use: to buy oil, rice, beans, flour, seasonings and snacks

loans.name: Xochitl Azusena

texts.es:
Xochilt, vive con sus tres hijos, ellos estudian y son dependientes, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, este negocio lo aprendió por su madre, lleva más de 6 años en él, ofreciendo las frutas y verduras frescas en el mercado, hasta el momento cuenta con clientela.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de  más frutas y verduras como: bananos, peras, uvas, fresas, ciruelas, papas, güisquiles, yuca, entre otros que son demandados en el mercado, la compra le ayudara para mejorar el negocio y poder continuar ofreciendo frutos frescos a la clientela.
Ella quiere ofrecer una mejor calidad a sus clientes, aspira que a través de préstamo puedan conseguir el crecimiento tanto en clientes como en el negocio.
texts.en:
Xochilt lives with her three siblings who are students and independent adults. She earns a living selling fruit and vegetables, a job she learned from her mother. She’s been selling fresh produce in the market for more than six years and has a regular clientele. 

Xochilt is seeking a loan to buy more fruit and vegetables like bananas, pears, grapes, strawberries, plums, potatoes, güisquiles, and yucca which her customers ask for. The money will help her improve her business and enable her to continue selling fresh produce to her customers.

She wishes to provide better quality produce and hopes, through this loan, to be able to both grow her business and increase her customer base.

loans.use: to buy bananas, pears, grapes, strawberries, plums, potatoes, güisquiles, and yucca

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Félix de 45 años de edad convive con Zenobia de 36 años fruto de esta relación tienen 5 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de catarata del distrito de Pichari. Félix, es un agricultor dedicado al cultivo de café desde que tenía 15 años de edad. La clave esta en dedicarse constantemente para obtener buenos frutos. Generalmente trabaja solo pero en temporadas de cosecha recurre a los peones para que le pueda facilitar la extracción de los granos de café. A pesar de todo los beneficios que ha obtenido, ha tenido también inconvenientes como la sequía, que no cuenta con agua suficiente para regar a su parcela agrícola y esto le ocasiona gastos, por que una vez que los granos de café se recolectan entra a la despulpadora luego se requiere abundante agua para separa los granos de la cáscara, cosa que le es insuficiente el agua con el que cuenta. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP, por el que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles lo invertirá para contratar peones  y sacar la maleza de cafetales.
texts.en:
45-year old Félix lives with 36-year old Zenobia and their five children in their own home located in the community of Catarata in the district of Pichari. He has been a coffee farmer since he was fifteen years old and knows how important it is to dedicate oneself to the work in order to obtain a good crop. Generally Félix works alone but at harvest time he needs labourers to help him gather the coffee beans. 

In spite of all the advantages that have come his way, there have also been some problems such as drought when he doesn’t have sufficient water to irrigate his land. He also has to spend money on water as once the harvested coffee beans are put into the grinding machine, a lot of water is required to separate the bean from the husk.

This is Félix’s first loan with MFP and he promises to make the repayments on time. With the 2,500 soles he will hire labourers to rid his fields of weeds.

loans.use: to hire labourers to help on his coffee farm

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Carlos Oscar

texts.es: El señor Carlos nacido en la ciudad de Cochabamba de 24 años de edad, se dedica al servicio de protesista dental desde hace 2 años esta  actividad la realiza en su domicilio ubicado en el km 7 zona capacachi, el señor es emprendedor inicio su propio negocio cuenta con herramientas y equipos propios que le ayudan a realizar los distintos pedidos que tiene por parte de los odontólogos con los que trabaja actualmente vive en casa propia de herencia familiar; el señor es soltero es  una persona amable y responsable , el crédito que se le otorga le ayudara a reparar y compra repuestos para sus maquinas que necesitan mantenimiento, el señor nos comenta que esta agradecido por la confianza brindada en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en:
Señor Carlos was born in the town of Cochabamba. He is 24 years old and makes dental prosthetics, work he’s been doing for two years out of his home located at km 7 in the Capacachi zone. He is an enterprising man and started this business himself. He has his own tools and equipment to make the different prosthetics that the orthodontists order from him.

Carlos lives in the house he inherited from his parents. He is single, friendly, and responsible. The loan he is seeking will be used to service and buy spares for the equipment which is in need of maintenance. He is grateful for the confidence shown in offering him with a loan.

loans.use: to buy spares for his prosthetic-making equipment

loans.name: Simon

texts.es:
Simón, necesita invertir un nuevo préstamo para comprar mercadería e instalar su negocio en la feria de su pueblo ya que llega mucha gente y él quiere tener una entrada de dinero para su familia, comprará productos como gaciosas, jugos, agua en bolsa y otros para venderlos en la feria.
Simón ha tenido una buena experiencia en el manejo de estos préstamos gracias a Dios sus familiares se encuentran bien y también han sido beneficiados con este progreso en el comercio.
texts.en:
Simón needs to invest a new loan in buying merchandise and installing his business in his village market as there are a lot of people who visit the market and he would like to make money for his family.  He will buy products such as soda, juice, bagged water, etc. to sell in the market.

Simón has good experience in managing these loans.  Thanks to God, his family members are well and they have benefited from the progress he has made in his business.

loans.use: to buy soda, juice and bags of water

loans.name: Nora

texts.es: Nora de 58 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora  y empeñosa, además de alegre y sociable, es separada de su esposo, vive en compañía de uno de sus hijos de 37 años de edad siendo aún soltero, instalados cómodamente en su propia casa. El negocio que tiene Nora es la venta de ropa de segundo uso, de toda las variedades tanto para damas, caballero y niños, la cual compra en los centros comerciales de la ciudad de Pucallpa, para luego llevarlo por zonas alejas como los caseríos y centro poblados en donde los vende al doble de su precio de costo. Tiene más de 4 años desdeicándose a este negocio, y en un inicio lo hizo sola con un capital propio, con el tiempo ha logrado ser conocida por esa zona y ahora también vende a crédito a 30 días. Con los ingresos que le deja ha logrado solventarse sus gastos de alimentación, así como también ha podido conocer nuevas personas  llegando a hacer nuevas amistades. Por lo contrario lo que no le gusta es que algunos de sus clientes se han retrasado en el pago de sus créditos otorgados. Por otro lado, comenta que desea incursionar en otro negocio como la venta de comida. Este será el préstamo número 5 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Además comenta sentirse cómoda con su banco comunal, pues dice conocer a sus miembros y los considera ser buenas personas. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en su totalidad en la compra de ropa al por mayor de todas las variedades y modelos para ésta campaña navideña.
texts.en:
58-year-old Nora is a hard-working and dedicated woman.  She is also cheerful and sociable.  Nora is separated from her husband and lives together with one of her children who is 37 years old and still single.  They live comfortably together in their own home.

Nora's business is selling second-hand clothing of all kinds for men, women and children.  She buys her products in the shopping centers in the city of Pucallpa.  She then takes them to remote areas, small villages and hamlets, where she sells them for double the price she pays.  She has been in this business for more than four years.  At first she carried out her business with her own capital but, over time, she became well known in the area and now she also sells her products on 30 days credit.  Nora uses the income that she makes to cover her family's food expenses.  She has also come to know new people and has made new friendships.  What Nora doesn't like about her work is that some of her customers have delayed making payments to her.

Nora says that she would like to start out in a new business selling food.  This will be her fifth loan from MFP and she hopes to receive a small loan so that she can achieve her goals.  She says that she feels comfortable being a member of her community bank as she knows the other members and considers them to be good people.  Nora will use the sum that she has requested (1,000 soles) to invest in buying all kinds of clothes wholesale to sell during the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Luz Mery

texts.es: La señora Luz Mery a sus 44 años de edad es madre cabeza de familia y tiene de dos hijos de 26 y 15 años de edad. Es propietaria de una pequeña tienda la cual pudo adquirir gracias a un primo quien le presto el dinero para comprar surtido para su negocio. La tienda le permite a la señora Luz Mery obtener los ingresos para el sustento de su hogar. La señora Luz Mery requiere de la compra de surtido tal como granos, aceites, detergentes y productos de aseo personal, que le permitan mejorar sus ventas y así la calidad de vida de su familia. El sueño de la señora Luz Mery es brindarle educación a sus hijos y tener su tienda bien surtida y con muchos clientes.
texts.en: Luz Mery is 44 years old and is a single mother with two children, who are 26 and 15 years old. She owns a small store, which she was able to purchase thanks to a cousin who lent her the money to buy various products for her business. The store allows Luz Mery to earn enough income to support her household. Luz Mery needs to buy a variety of products like grains, oil, detergent and personal hygiene products, which will allow her to improve her sales as well as her family's quality of life. Luz Mery's dreams are to provide her children with an education, to offer a wide variety of products in her store, and to have many customers.

loans.use: buy a variety of products like grains, oil, detergent and personal hygiene products

loans.name: Karina

texts.es: Karina, de 26 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, como también social y amable, es separada, vive en compañía de sus tres pequeños hijos de 8, 6 y 4 años de edad a los que quiere mucho, instalados cómodamente en su casa propia. El negocio que tiene Karina es la venta de ropa de segundo uso para damas y caballeros, la cual compra al por mayor en los centro comerciales de su ciudad, para luego enviarlo a las zonas alejadas a varias personas quienes reciben y se dedican a la venta por menor. Éste neogico se inicio hace 3 años con un pequeño capital propio que lo invirtió. Le gusta su negocio pues no le ocupa mucho tiempo y puede tener tiempo para dedicarse a sus hijos. Asimismo puede cumplir con los gastos de su familia, pues con la pensión que le da su ex pareja muchas veces no les alcanza para la alimentación. Ahora viendo las buenas ganancias que le deja , tiene planes de abrir una tienda de venta de ropa. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP. Esta muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio o trabajo. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crédito que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles lo invertirá en su totalidad en la compra de ropa de segundo uso al por mayor para ésta campaña navideña.
texts.en:
Karina, who is 26 years old, is a hardworking and industrious woman, as well as social and friendly. She is separated from her husband and lives with her three small children, ages 8, 6, and 4, who she loves very much and who are settled comfortably in her own house. 

The business Karina has is selling secondhand clothing for men and women, which she buys wholesale in the downtown area of her city so that she can send it later to remote areas to several people who get it and make a living in retail. 

She began this business three years ago by investing a small amount of her own capital. She likes the business because it does not take too much time, and she can spend time with her children. Likewise, she can pay for her family's expenses, since the alimony from her ex-husband is oftentimes not enough to sustain them. 

Now, seeing the good profit that she can make, she has plans to open a clothing store. This will be her fourth loan with the MFP institution. She is very happy to know that she will have financial support, since that will help her feel confident about going forward with her business or job. 

On a different note, she promises once again to pay her loans, as she did with the loans she had in the past. Furthermore, she is grateful to be part of her community bank because all of its members are very responsible and supportive people. She will put the requested amount of 800 nuevos soles towards the wholesale purchase of secondhand clothing for her Christmastime sales.

loans.use: to buy secondhand clothing.

loans.name: Juan De Dios

texts.es: El Joven  juan es cliente nuevo, será su primera secuencia de su crédito,  el  es soltero y trabaja junto a su hermanito en la venta de chocolates por mayor  en una feria muy concurrida de la Ciudad de la Paz,  juan vive  en la ciudad de la paz, el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de material de construcción refacción de dos cuartos donde vive actualmente  que es casa  de su mama. Los clientes trabajan sacrificadamente  ambos hermanos  cooperándose mutuamente en  el trabajo, se encuentran muy contentos por  ser beneficiados con el crédito, el joven Juan es una persona muy trabajadora, con ganas de superación.
texts.en:
The young man Juan is a new client. This will be his first loan cycle. 

He is single and works with his younger brother selling wholesale chocolates in a crowded market place in the city of Paz. Juan lives in Paz. 

He will use the loan to buy construction supplies to repair two rooms where he currently lives in his mother’s home. Both of the clients make sacrifices, cooperating with one another at work, and are very happy to be given a loan. 

Juan, a young man, is a hard worker and eager to triumph.

loans.use: purchase of materials for repairs to 2 rooms

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es: Lorenzo, debido a la temporada que se acerca está solicitando un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de un flete de dulce de panela, también granos básicos a arroz, frijoles, café, esta decisión se debe a su deseo de seguir creciendo y generando mayores ganancias para solventar las necesidades su familia, permitiéndole tener mayor disponibilidad de dinero para cualquier emergencia.
texts.en: Due to the upcoming season, Lorenzo is requesting a loan to invest in a shipment of dulce de panela (brown sugarloaf/raw cane sugar), basic grains, rice, beans and coffee. He decided to take out a loan in order continue growing his business and generating more income to pay for his family's necessities. This would also allow him to save money for any emergencies that may come up.

loans.use: buy dulce de panela (brown sugarloaf), rice, beans and coffee.

loans.name: Maria Tomasa

texts.es:
María, debido a la necesidad de mejorar la panadería, solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales como harina, azúcar, levadura y un par de cerdos para la granja. Esta inversión espera que sea igual de provechosa que la anterior, mejorando sus ventas y la atención que brinda a los clientes.
Ella ha mejorado su condición como panadera y sus ganancias estan en crecimiento.
texts.en:
María, due to the necessity of improving the bakery, is asking for a loan in order to buy some supplies such as flour, sugar, yeast, and a couple of pigs for the farm.

This expenditure should be as beneficial as the previous one, improving her sales and the care that she gives to the customers.

She has bettered her situation as a baker and her earnings are increasing.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, yeast, and a couple of pigs

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma, de 48 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, así como alegre y amable, está casada con Arturo que es palmicultor, vive en compañía de su esposo y sus dos hijos de 32 y 20 años de edad y sus dos nietos a los que quiere mucho, instalados cómodamente en su propia casa. El negocio que tiene Norma es la venta de jugos de frutas tales como naranjas, piñas, toronjas y otros. Cuyo negocio está instalado en el frontis de su casa, con una mesa en donde atiende a sus clientes de una manera amable y cordial durante toda la mañana hasta el medio día. 
Le agrada su negocio pues le permite contar con tiempo por las tardes para dedicarlo a su casa, y apoyar a sus hijas en el cuidado de sus nietos, además de ver buenas ganancias de hasta el 50% de lo invertido. Por tanto tiene planes de continuar en el negocio y desea poder ampliarlo instalado mesas y sillas, así como abrir un local en su propia casa donde pueda atender cómodamente a sus clientes. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Además dice sentirse bien con su banco comunal pues considera a sus miembros ser buenas personas y responsables. Con el monto solicitado de 2500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en su negocio en la compra de frutas y con el saldo comprará mesas y sillas para la comodidad de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Norma is 48 years old. She is a hardworking, diligent woman, and happy and friendly. She married to Arturo who is a palm farmer. She lives with her husband and her 2 children who are 32 and 20 years old, and her 2 grandchildren who she loves very much, comfortably established in her own home. 

Norma’s business is selling fruit juice, such as orange, pineapple, and grapefruit as well as others. Her business is located in the front of her house, with a table where she takes care of her clients in a friendly and warmhearted way through the morning until noon.

What she likes about her business is that it allows her time in the evenings to be at home, and to help her daughters care for her grandchildren. Also, seeing good profit of up to 50 percent of the investment. Therefore, she has plans to continue in the business and wants to be able to add to the tables and chairs, as well as to open a facility in her own home where she can assist her clients comfortably. 

This will be her 4th loan with MFP, and therefore she is waiting for its approval in order to continue with her goals. Also, she says she feels good about the community bank because she considers the members to be good and trustworthy people.

With the amount requested of 2500 soles she will invest in her business buying fruit and with the remainder she will buy tables and chairs for the comfort of her clients.

loans.use: to buy fruit, tables, and chairs

loans.name: Alba Nidia

texts.es: La señora Alba Nidia a sus 48 años de edad es madre de una hija de 20 años de edad. La señora Alba Nidia es una emprendedora quien desea iniciar su propio negocio de venta de mercancía a sus familiares, amigos y vecinos. Por varios años, la señora Alba Nidia trabajo como empleada en varios almacenes por lo que cuenta con experiencia en el sector. La señora Alba Nidia requiere de la compra de lociones, cosméticos y accesorios femeninos con el fin de tener surtido para la temporada de fin de año. Con lo anterior, la señora Alba Nidia podrá mejorar sus ingresos y así la calidad de vida de su familia. El sueño de la señora Alba Nidia es tener su propio almacén de venta de ropa y accesorios para toda la familia.
texts.en: Alba Nidia is 48 years old and is the mother of a 20-year-old daughter. She is an entrepreneur who would like to start her own business selling merchandise to her family members, friends and neighbors. For many years, she worked as an employee at a number of stores, so she has experience in the sector. Alba Nidia needs to buy lotions, cosmetics and accessories for women, so that she can stock a variety of merchandise for the holiday season. With this purchase, Alba Nidia will be able to earn more and improve her family's quality of life. Alba Nidia's dream is to own her own store to sell clothing and accessories for the whole family.

loans.use: buy various products such as body lotion, cosmetics and women's accessories

loans.name: Agbogbé

texts.fr:
Agbogbé est une femme  âgé(e) de 24ans. Elle est mariée å un  soudeur . Elle a 02 enfants, tous à l’école. Le premier a 09 ans et le dernier a 05ans.  
Agbogbé travaille comme revendeuse de pains, de riz, de spaguetti depuis 1998. Elle vend de façon ambulante et achéte les pains dans une boulangerie du quartier et les autres produits à Lomé. La difficulté qu’elle rencontre sur le terrain est la concurrence.
Agbogbé a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter plus de marchandises Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Agbogbé voudrait agrandir son commerce. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit intervenir dans l’éducation de ses enfants et avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
Agbogbé is a 24-year-old woman. She is married to a welder and has two children, both in school. The eldest is nine and the youngest is 5 years old.

Agbogbé works as a retail vendor of bread, rice, and spaghetti since 1998. She operates as an itinerant vendor, buying her bread from a bakery in the neighborhood and other products in Lome. The challenge she faces in the field is the competition.

Agbogbé requested her first loan from WAGES to purchase more goods; she wants to reinvest in her business activity.

In coming years, Agbogbé would like to expand her business. She said that the profits will allow her to participate in the children's education and enjoy a happy family.

loans.use: Buy bread, rice, and other products

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy baskets of dried fish to add to her current ones.

loans.name: Cesar Alberto

texts.es:
César, necesita darle mantenimiento a su vehículo, ya que le sirve para el trabajo, en el transporte de muebles de una comercial, por eso solicita nuevamente un préstamo que cubra el pago de mecánico para darle mantenimiento a la cama del vehículo, pintarlo, tapizarlo. El préstamo anterior le ayudo para comprarse materiales de costura, en la actualidad su vechiculo lo utiliza para hacer viajes a una comercial, paga ganar dinero extra. 
El tiene buenas experiencias del trabajar con préstamos, ya que es una persona responsable en sus pagos y ha hecho buenas inversiones que le han dado una mejor condición en la actualidad
texts.en:
César needs maintenance on his vehicle that he uses for work transporting furniture for a company.  The new loan will cover paying a mechanic for vehicle maintenance to the bed, painting and putting in mats.  The last loan helped him buy sewing supplies.  He now uses the vehicle to make trips to the company since he can earn extra money.
He has good experiences working with loans since he is responsible with his payments and has used the money well.

loans.use: to pay a mechanic, buy paint and mats for his vehicle.

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es: Luis, necesita comprar nueva mercadería para su negocio, por eso está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo para invertirlo en ropa de cama como cubrecamas, almohadas, sábanas, cortinas, con la intención de mejorar y crecer en el negocio, para ofrecer a los clientes diversidad de productos con nuevos colores que le permita mejorar sus ingresos. Él espera que este nuevo préstamo sea como el anterior que le dé la oportunidad de mejorar el negocio y poder mantenerse en el comercio.
texts.en:
Luis needs to buy new merchandise for his business. Because of this, he is asking for another loan to put towards bedding like bedspreads, pillows, sheets, and drapes, with the aim of improving and expanding his business. 

He wants to offer clients a variety of products in new colors, which will allow him to raise his income. He hopes that this new loan will be like the last one, which gave him the opportunity to improve his trade and the ability to stay in business.

loans.use: to buy bedspreads, pillows, sheets, and drapes.

loans.name: Los Vencedores De Carabayllo Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Carmen Doris, tiene 36 años de edad, tiene dos hijos pequeños, ella es socia del grupo "Los Vencedores de Carabayllo", es un grupo nuevo que se a reunido para conjuntamente lograr conseguir su progreso económico.
La Sra. Carmen Doris se dedica desde hace dos años a la venta de salchipapas, pollos broaster y sanguches, iniciò su negocio debido a que su esposo perdió el trabajo, por loq ue al ser liquidado con ese dinero decidieron conjuntamente invertirlo en la compra de un carrito sanguchero y ambientar un espacio en su casa para poder iniciar su negocio, poco a poco ha ido mejorando y aumentando su clientela, hoy en día su esposo nuevamente se encuentra tabajando para una empresa y es la Sra. Carmen Doris quien se encarga de la atención del negocio.
Gracias a su trabajo ella puede apoyar en los gastos familiares y ha logrado adquirir sus artefactos y satisfacer las necesidades de sus hijos.
Su proxima meta es poner un restaurante.
Con el préstamo recibido hará mejoras en el ambiente destinado a su negocio y comprará mesas para poder recibir mas clientela.
texts.en:
Señora Carmen Doris is 36 years old and has two small children. She is a member of the group "Los Vencedores de Carabayllo." This is a new group that has formed so that the members can succeed in making economic progress together.

For two years Señora Carmen Doris has had a business selling salchipapas (a Peruvian dish made from potatoes and sausages), broasted chicken, and sandwiches. She began her business because her husband lost his job. Because he received some money when he was let go, they decided together to invest the money in the purchase of a sandwich cart and to arrange a space in their house to be able to set up their business. Little by little she has been making improvements and getting more customers. Now her husband is working at a company and it is Señora Carmen Doris who is in charge of tending to the business.

Thanks to her work she can help with the family expenses and she has managed to buy their appliances and meet the needs of their children.

Her next goal is to open a restaurant. With her loan she will make improvements in the space assigned to her business and buy tables to be able to receive more customers.

loans.use: to invest in improvements in her premises and the purchase of tables to be able to serve more customers.

loans.name: Marleni

texts.es: La señora Marleni tiene como actividad la venta de comida en un local ubicado en la zona de Altolima, al norte de la ciudad de el alto de la Paz Bolivia, la señora Marleni se levanta muy temprano 6:00 am  para realizar la elaboración de la comida y los demás preparativos que se necesitan para esta actividad. Cuenta con el apoyo de sus dos hijos para los cuales solicita este crédito es para pagar las pensiones de la colegiatura de sus hijos. El esposo trabaja como empleado y percibe un sueldo fijo con el cual aporta al ingreso familiar. El mayor sueño de la señora Marleni es el que algún día sus hijos sean profesionales y puedan tener un futuro mejor.
texts.en: Marleni sells food in her business located in the zone of Altolima, to the north of El Alto y La Paz, Bolivia. Marleni wakes up very early in the morning, at 6:00am, to begin making the food and the other preparations that are needed to sell food. She is assisted by her two children and is requesting a loan to be able to pay for their school tuition fees. Her husband is employed and earns a fixed salary which contributes to the family income. Marleni's biggest dream is that one day her children will be working professionals and can have a better future.

loans.use: pay for her children's tuition fees.

loans.name: Kodjo

texts.fr:
Kodjo est un homme âgé  de 42 ans. Il est marié å un/e revendeuse et ont ensemble 03enfants qui vont à l’école. Le premier a 14ans et le dernier 06ans.
Kodjo travaille comme tailleur et revendeur de matériaux d’électricité depuis 2001. Il vend seul à la maison et sa difficulté principale est la concurrence.
Kodjo a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter plus de marchandises. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité afin de répondre plus à la demande de la population.
Dans les prochaines années, Kodjo voudrait agrandir en ajoutant d’autre activités. Il dit qu’avec les profits, Il prévoit avoir une famille bien éduquée et heureuse.
texts.en:
Kodjo is a 42-year-old man, married to a retail merchant. They have three children who attend school: the eldest is 14 and the youngest is six years old.

Kodjo has been working as a tailor and dealer of electrical products since 2001. He sells by himself from his home and says his main difficulty is the competition.

Kodjo is requesting his first WAGES credit loan to purchase more goods. He wants to reinvest in the business in response to the population's requests

In coming years, Kodjo wants to expand by adding other activities. He said that with the profits he expects to have a well-educated and happy family.

loans.use: Buy electrical products

loans.name: Agnelo

texts.es:
El señor Agnelo esta solicitando un crédito con  nosotros porque desea invertir en comprar carnes al por mayor; para producir más y así que su margen de ganancias aumente. El cuenta con tres pequeños puestos de comida con los cuales de empleo a 3 familias y quienes se verán beneficiadas al otorgar este crédito. 
 El seños Agnelo y su familia son del estado de Chiapas, ya tiene mas de dos años residiendo en esta ciudad; al no encontrar un empleo que se ajustara a sus necesidades decidieron empezar su propio negocio, el cual a funcionado y tiene muchos clientes porque también entregan pedidos grandes para posadas y fiestas.
texts.en:
Señor Agnelo is applying for a loan with us because he wants to invest in buying meat wholesale, so that he can produce more and at the same time his profint margin will increase. He has three small food stands with which he gives employment to three families who will be benefited by the granting of this loan.

Señor Agnelo and his family are from the state of Chiapas, but they have already been living in this city for more than two years. Because he didn't find a job that met their needs, they decided to begin their own business, which has worked well. He has many customers, because they also deliver big orders for inns and parties.

loans.use: to buy meat wholesale, as well as tortillas

loans.name: Maria Josefina

texts.es: La señora María Josefina a sus 54 años de edad es madre de cuatro hijos, se dedica a la elaboración de manualidades como muñecos de tela, accesorios, bisutería, entre otros productos. La señora María Josefina trabaja sola en su casa y vende sus productos en diferentes almacenes del municipio de Rionegro ubicado al oriente de Antioquia. La señora María Josefina requiere de la compra de materia prima tal como telas, botones y moldes para realizar muñecos navideños para vender en la temporada de fin de año. Con lo anterior, la señora María Josefina podrá aumentar sus ingresos y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y a futuro crear su propia empresa y en ella generar empleos directos para sus familiares y amigos.
texts.en: María Josefina is 54 years old and is the mother of four children. She makes crafts such as cloth dolls, accessories, and jewelry, among other things. She works alone at home, and sells her products to various stores in the municipality of Rio Negro, located in the eastern part of Antioquia. Maria Josefina needs to buy raw materials like cloth, buttons and molds to make Christmas dolls to sell for the holiday season. With this purchase, Maria Josefina will be able to increase her income and thus improve her family's quality of life. In the future, she hopes to be able to create her own business in order to generate jobs for her friends and family members.

loans.use: buy raw materials like cloth, buttons and molds to make Christmas dolls

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  ”VIRGEN PURIFICADA DE TUPAC AMARU;  El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urcos en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Bernardina;  La socia tiene 55 años de edad, La socia es casada, La socia tiene 4 hijos de 27, 20, 19, 15 años de edad; La socia trabaja vendiendo papa al por mayor de sus cultivo en la feria dominical, también la socia compra y venta de animales menores como gallinas ponedoras de huevos. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de 20 gallinas ponedoras para incrementar el negocio.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "Virgen Purificada de Tupac Amaru". The community bank can be found in the district of Urcos in the province of Quispicanchis in the Cusco department.
The member's name is Bernadina. She is 55 years old, married, and has 4 children of 27, 20, 19, and 15 years of age. She works selling potatoes in bulk in the Sunday market and she also buys and sells small animals such as laying hens. She is requesting a loan to buy 20 laying hens to grow her business.
She is grateful for the loan and promises to make the repayments according to the timetable.

loans.use: to buy 20 laying hens to grow her business.

loans.name: Claudia Catalina

texts.es:
Claudia es socia del Banco Comunal Amauta Huamanga, tiene 42 años, es madre de 2 hijos, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 17 años.
Claudia es dueña de una tienda de abarrotes y ropas, recuerda con mucha satisfacción todo lo que Finca le brindó y le pudo ayudar para progresar, ella empezó su negocio vendiendo gelatina y poco a poco reunió su dinero y empezó a traer ropas, tuvo su puesto en el mercado, cuando su papá necesitaba ayuda ella le pudo ayudar, agradece mucho a Finca que le ayudaron cuando ella mas lo requería, aprendió mucho de las capacitaciones que le dieron una guía para poder tener una vida ordenada, ahora el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos para tu tienda.
texts.en: Claudia is a member of the Amauta Huamanga Communal Bank. She is 42 years old and is the mother of two children. She has been a member of FINCA Perú for 17 years. Claudia owns a grocery and clothing store. She remembers with a lot of satisfaction, all that FINCA has offered her and how they've helped her to progress. She started her business selling gelatin and little by little she was able to save money and started to sell clothes too. She had her own place in the market and when her father needed help, she was able to help him. She appreciates that Finca helped her when she needed it most. Claudia has learned a lot through their trainings and they gave her a guide on how to live a more organized life. The current loan she is requesting through Finca, will be used to purchase cosmetics for her store.

loans.use: purchase cosmetics for her business.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: José, de 36 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y decidido, así como amable y cordial, es conviviente con Julia, quien es ama de casa. Juntos habitan en casa de sus padres con su pareja y sus dos hijos de 8 y 5 años de edad a los que quiere mucho. La actividad que tiene José es el servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su vehiculo trimóvil conocido como mototaxi, con el cual recorre todas las calles de la ciudad en zonas céntricas y  alejadas  llevando a sus pasajeros a sus destino. Tiene más de 03 años realizando ésta actividad, en un principio contaba con un mototaxi que compró en la modalidad de alquiler venta. Ahora le gusta su actividad pues le genera un ingreso económico con el cual puede solventar los gastos de alimentación de su familia y apoyar en la economía  en la casa de sus padres, así como poder manejar sus horarios de trabajo. Por el contrario, no le gusta cuando llueve muy seguido pues eso dificulta poder realizar su trabajo, ya que se malogra su vehiculo. Por otro lado, desea poder abrir una bodega en la casa de sus padres en donde atendería su pareja, de esa manera tendría un ingreso económico extra. Este será el préstamo número 5 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio, y se compromete en ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas como en los créditos anteriores. Por otro lado dice sentirse bien con su banco comunal pues considera a sus miembros ser personas responsables y solidarias. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes al por mayor para implementar un nuevo negocio en una bodega en la casa de sus  padres.
texts.en:
José, who is 36 years old, is a hard-working and determined man, as well as being kind and cordial. He lives with his partner, Julia, who is a housewife,  and their two children, ages 8 and 5, whom he loves very much, in the house of his parents. José's business is transporting passengers in his three-wheeled vehicle, known as a mototaxi, with which he travels through all the streets of the city, both in and away from the center, transporting his passengers to their destinations. He has been doing this work for more than three years. At first he had a mototaxi that he bought through a rent-to-own plan. Now he likes his business since it generates an income with which he can pay the expenses to feed his family and help the finances in his parents' home, and also because he can manage his working hours. In contrast, he doesn't like it when it rains for a long time, since it is difficult to be able to do his work, since it's bad for his vehicle. On the other hand, he wants to be able to open a store in his parents' house, which his partner can tend to. In this way he will have an extra income. 

This will be his fifth loan with MFP. He feels thankful for the financial support to advance in his business, and he promises to be punctual in making his payments, as he did with his previous loans. On the other hand, he says that he feels good about his communal bank since he considers its members to be people who are responsible and united. With the 2000 PEN he has applied for, he will invest in the wholesale purchase of groceries to set up a new business, a grocery store in his parents' house.

loans.use: to buy products to set up a grocery store.

loans.name: Gregorya Nancy

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  ”VIRGEN PURIFICADA DE TUPAC AMARU;  El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urcos en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Gregoria;  La socia tiene 38 años de edad, La socia es conviviente, La socia tiene 2 hijos de 12, 3 años de edad; La socia trabaja vendiendo colchones y frezadas al por mayor y menor a sus diversas clientes, la socia desea invertir en esta ocasión el préstamo en la compra de frazadas al por mayor porque se viene la época de lluvias y hace mas frio en la sierra sur de Perú; la socia requiere incrementar su mercadería para abastecer a sus clientes en esta época. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de frazadas al por mayor.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: Gregorya belongs to the communal bank "Virgen Purificada de Tupac Amaru". The communal bank is located in the district of Urcos in Quispicanchis province in the department of Cusco. Gregorya is 38 years old and lives with her partner. She has two children that are 12 and 3 years old. She sells mattresses and blankets, both wholesale and retail, to her diverse group of customers. She wishes to use this current loan to invest in the purchase of wholesale blankets because the rainy season is approaching and it's getting colder in the southern mountain range of Perú. She needs to increase her merchandise to supply her clients during this season. Gregorya appreciates the loan and she is committed to completing her payments according to the payment plan.

loans.use: invest in the purchase of wholesale blankets.

loans.name: José Raúl

texts.es:
El señor José Raúl y su esposa son los que atiende juntos el negocio de venta de ropa en diferentes partes de la ciudad; comentan que con el préstamo va a invertir en comprar más ropa nueva de temporada de invierno y así tener más variedad de mercancía para ofrecerles a sus clientes.
Don José Raúl además de atender su negocio los fines de semana, también tiene un empleo como intendente (limpieza) de una escuela. Desean mejorar la calidad de vida de ellos dos y tener un prestimonio seguro cuando ya estén viejos ya que sus hijos están casados y tiene sus propias familias.
texts.en: José Raúl and his wife, together, tend to their clothing business in different parts of the city. They will use the loan to invest in the purchase of more new clothing for winter. This way, they will have more variety to offer their customers. In addition to running the store, José Raúl works as a school janitor on the weekends. They wish to improve the quality of their life and to have a secure living when they are older and their children are married and have their own families.

loans.use: purchase merchandise for his business selling used and new clothing.

loans.name: Victorina

texts.es:
Victorina, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, de 18 y 16 años de edad, ambos estudian, ella es propietaria de transporte de carga pesada, todos los días su actividad principal es despachar a los motoristas para que inicien su trabajo, ella solamente administra y controla el uso del transporte, para el manejo tiene empleados.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de repuestos y pago de mano de obra, este préstamo solventara la necesidad de darle mantenimiento a un camión, ya que esto le permitirá alargar la vida de sus vehículos y seguir prestando los servicios y generando ganancias.
Doña Victorina sueña con comprar un vehículo más para trabajar, además de gozar de salud junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Victorina lives with her husband and two children, who are 18 and 16 years old. They are both in school. Victorina is the owner of a heavy-cargo transport business. Her main activity every day is to dispatch the drivers to their jobs. She only administers and controls the use of the vehicles. She has employees to do the driving.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of spare parts and to pay for labor. This loan will take care of some needed maintenance on a truck. It will help her to extend the life of her vehicles and to continue offering her services and generating income. Doña Victorina dreams of purchasing another vehicle for her business and of enjoying good health, along with her family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and pay for labor to repair her truck

loans.name: Eulogio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  ”VIRGEN PURIFICADA DE TUPAC AMARU;  El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urcos en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Eulogio;  El socio tiene 47 años de edad, El socio es conviviente, El socio tiene 4 hijos de 17, 12, 10, 1 años de edad; El socio trabaja en el municipio, el socio  también se dedica paralelamente a la crianza de vacuno, el socio desea ahora invertir en la compra de un torete para criarlo y engordarlo hasta que pueda procrear. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de un torete.
El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Sr. Eulogio is a member of the Communal Bank “Virgen Purificada de Tupac Amaru” which is located in the District of Urcos in Quispicanchis Province, Department of Cusco.

He is 47 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has four children (ages 17, 12, 10, and 1). Eulogio works in the municipality, but he also raises cattle. He wants to invest in the purchase of a young bull to raise and fatten so that it can be used for procreation. Therefore, he is requesting a loan to invest in a young bull.

Eulogio is grateful for this loan and promises to complete his payments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy a young bull.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase display cabinets and merchandise such as oil, soap, pastas, and sodas.

loans.name: Santos Agustin

texts.es: Santos Agustín  tiene 28 años de edad, es un emprendedor con éxito que su actividad económica es de brindar servicio musical. Santos Agustín se le ha apoyado atreves de los fondos  Kiva con un financiamiento para que el pueda invertir en su negocio y brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Santos ha tenido éxito con su negocio, desde sus inicio a buscado como mejorar su nivel de vida buscando alternativas para poder generar ingresos a su familia y darle  una calidad de vida mejor. Santos ha sido un excelente clientes y está solicitando un nuevo crédito para poder comprar materia prima como: alambres, extensiones, parlantes entre otros equipos que requiere.
texts.en:
Santos Agustín is 28 years old and a successful entrepreneur who provides musical services. Once again, he is seeking the support of Kiva funds by requesting a loan to invest his business so that he can provide better service to his customers. Santos has been successful with his business from the beginning and is looking for ways to improve his standard of living. He looks for alternatives that will generate income for his family and give them a better quality of life.

Santos has excellent customers and is requesting a new loan to buy supplies such as wires, extension cords, speakers, and other equipment that he needs.

loans.use: to buy wires, extension cords, speakers, and other equipment.

loans.name: Jovana

texts.es: Yovana es socia del Banco Comunal Amauta Huamanga, tiene 35 años, ella se dedica a la venta de llantas usadas, es madre de 2 hijos, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 3 años, FINCA le ayudó a poder ahorrar, y a ser mas responsable, poco a poco pudo aumentar su capital, ella esta muy feliz y agradece todas las enseñanzas que le inculcan, como invertir también le enseñaron y gracias a esas enseñanzas ahora puede tener un buen negocio, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de llantas, y mayor meta es poder comprar su casa.
texts.en:
Yovana is a member of the Communal Bank “Amauta Huamanga”. She is 35 years old and sells used tires. Yovana is the mother of two children. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for three years. FINCA helped her to save and be more responsible. Little by little, she was able to increase her capital. Yovana is very pleased and appreciative of all the training she has received, such as how to invest. Thanks to the lessons she has learned, she now has a good business.

Yovana is currently requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of tires. Her greatest goal is to buy a house.

loans.use: to buy tires to sell.
